mapper.sql: CoursewareID, TestQuestionDescribe, StandardIndex, QuestionNumber, BuildTime, ReviseTime
mapper.insert: insert into TestQuestionInformation (CoursewareID, TestQuestionDescribe, StandardIndex, QuestionNumber, BuildTime, ReviseTime) values (#{coursewareid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testquestiondescribe,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{standardindex,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{questionnumber,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{buildtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{revisetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update TestQuestionInformation set TestQuestionDescribe = #{testquestiondescribe,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, StandardIndex = #{standardindex,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, QuestionNumber = #{questionnumber,jdbcType=TINYINT}, BuildTime = #{buildtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ReviseTime = #{revisetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where CoursewareID = #{coursewareid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
